about: Hello there! My name is Ashutosh Randive and I'm a fullstack developer. I am very eager and enthusiastic to learn about new technologies and add to my knowledge. Currently I'm working on technologies like React, Vue and Django. I wish to further expand my knowledge about various technologies and the computer science.

experience.title: Software developer
experience.description: Working as a software developer. Working with VueJS, React, Django, frontend automation. Working as a Frontend developer for leading websites.

experience.title: Javascript intern
experience.description: Worked with frontend technologies such as VueJs, React Native, React as a JavaScript intern.

education.university: TPCT's College of Engineering, Babasaheb Ambedkar Technological University

projects.title: Auctions
projects.description: Auctions is a web application that allows users to bid on products.

projects.title: Covid Cases Tracker
projects.description: Simple COVID cases tracker for India. Shows data for different states, Data can be filtered, searched.

projects.title: Bloglist
projects.description: A simple bloglist application that allows users to create blogs, like blogs and comment on blogs.
